Texts.Chs: 人类是一种奇怪的物种。他们有着公平的领土与不可预测的行为。他们似乎对宇宙的其他物种只有最基本的了解，另外，他们有着如同孩儿一般渴望知识的求知欲。
Texts.Eng: Humans are a strange species. Equal parts territorial and adventurous, they are somewhat unpredictable to deal with. They seem to have only the most rudimentary understanding of other species in the universe, and a childlike desire for knowledge.

Texts.Chs: 后者的特点让我考虑是否能与其成为盟友。他们的侦察队是由接收指令的人组成的，但可笑地是，他们并没有发现我们的存在。如果他们发现了我们，我想我会和荆棘之翼谈谈是否应该与人类代表面谈。
Texts.Eng: The latter trait makes me consider whether they might be valuable allies. Scouting parties made up of people who are too driven to give up, but too naive to understand what they find. I will speak to Big Ape and Thornwing about the possibility of meeting with the human delegate, should one exist.
